>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/metrics/program/{programId}/range/{days}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns program metrics for the specified range (30/60/90 days)

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"programId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"days","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","enum":[30,60,90]}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
